title: Game Stops/Freezes in Install
body: So i just unistalled LoL and reinstalled to try and fix some problems i was having in-game. When i reinstalled it and it reached 76% it just stayed there frozen. it wasnt frozen as if everything just stopped. It just didnt kept downloading the three dots above the download were moving so i left it there for a few hours but it was still in 76% and i dont think it will ever move, is there anything i can do?

replies.body: Depending on your computer, it can take a few moments to download and update files from the patcher.  Unless your download speed drops to 0 for an extended period, it's important to allow the patcher to wrap things up.  Cancelling/closing the patcher could cause could cause it  to scan your files for any corruption and restart the update all over again.
If there were 3 dots that means it was still applying patches. Installation times vary from machine to machine and processor speed plays a large factor in it. Let it patch.
